elements.name: As a user I expect to be able to create a new contact

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "create" button
I am directed to the "create contact" page
the "create contact header" should contain the text "Create Contact"
I fill in the "name" input with "Ted Smith"
I select the "Male" option from the "gender"
I fill in the "phone" input with "0434555555"
I fill in the "street" input with "123 Fake Street"
I fill in the "city" input with "Melbourne"
I click the "save" button
I am directed to the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Ted Smith"
the "search" should not equal the text "Ted Smiths"
the "full name label" should contain the text "Name:"
the "name" should equal the text "Ted Smith"
the "gender label" should contain the text "Gender:"
the "gender" should equal the text "Male"
the "address label" should contain the text "Address:"
the "address" should equal the text "123 Fake Street, Melbourne"
the "edit" should be displayed
the "delete" should be displayed

name: As a user I expect to be able to create contacts

elements.name: As a user I expect to be able to see contacts

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
the "header logo" should be displayed
the "contacts header" should contain the text "Contacts"

elements.name: As a user I don't expect to see a contact that does not exist

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I fill in the "search" input with "Funky Name"
the "contact" should not be displayed

name: As a user I expect to be able to navigate to the home page

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on autocomplete inputs

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I fill in the "movies" input with "The G"
I click the "The Godfather" link
the "movies" should contain the value "The Godfather"
the "movies" should not contain the value "The Godfather: Part II"

name: As a user I can interact with autocomplete inputs

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on browser alerts

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I click the "browser alert" button
I click accept on the alert dialog
I click the "browser alert" link
I click dismiss on the alert dialog

name: As a user I can interact with browser alerts

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on buttons at index

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I click the "1st" "my button" button
the "1st" "my button" should contain the text "One"
I click the "2nd" "my button" button
the "2nd" "my button" should contain the text "Two"
I click the "3rd" "my button" button
the "3rd" "my button" should contain the text "Three"

name: As a user I can interact with buttons at index

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on checkboxes

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "blue" check box should not be checked
I check the "green" check box
I check the "grey" check box
the "red" check box should not be checked
the "purple" check box should not be checked
I uncheck the "green" check box
the "green" check box should not be checked

name: As a user I can interact with checkboxes

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on hidden and displayed text

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "show hide text" should be displayed
the "show hide text" should contain the text "This is visible"
I click the "show hide button" button
the "show hide text" should not be displayed

name: As a user I can interact with hidden and displayed text

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on iframes

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I fill in the "search" input on the "basic iframe" iframe with "Abraham Perry"
the "contact" on the "basic iframe" iframe should be displayed
the "full name label" on the "basic iframe" iframe should contain the text "Name:"
the "name" on the "basic iframe" iframe should equal the text "Abraham Perry"
the "gender label" on the "basic iframe" iframe should contain the text "Gender:"
the "gender" on the "basic iframe" iframe should equal the text "Male"
the "address label" on the "basic iframe" iframe should contain the text "Address:"
the "address" on the "basic iframe" iframe should equal the text "Ap #826-8849 Vulputate Street, Laramie"
the "edit" on the "basic iframe" iframe should be displayed
the "delete" on the "basic iframe" iframe should be displayed

name: As a user I can interact with iframes

the "validation label" should contain the text "Error"
the "validation label" should not contain the text "Errors"
the "validation error" should contain the text "Incorrect entry."

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on various inputs

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "outlined required" should equal the value "Testing"
the "outlined disabled" should equal the value "Talks"
the "outlined read only" should equal the value "Hub"
the "outlined required" should be enabled
the "outlined disabled" should not be enabled
I fill in the "outlined required" input with "Testing Talks Online"
the "outlined required" should equal the value "Testing Talks Online"

the "validation error" should contain the text "Incorrect entry."

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on autocomplete links

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I click the "primary" button
the "primary" should contain the text "Primary"
the "secondary" should not be enabled
the "secondary" should equal the text "Disabled"
I click the "third" link
the "third" should contain the text "Link"

name: As a user I can interact with links

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on page alerts

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "error alert" should contain the text "This is an error alert — check it out!"
the "warning alert" should contain the text "This is a warning alert — check it out!"
the "info alert" should contain the text "This is an info alert — check it out!"
the "success alert" should contain the text "This is a success alert — check it out!"

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on radio buttons

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "female label" should contain the text "Female"
the "male label" should contain the text "Male"
the "female label" should not contain the text "Male"
the "male label" should not contain the text "Female"
the "female" radio button should be checked
the "male" radio button should not be checked
I check the "male" radio button
the "male" radio button should be checked
the "female" radio button should not be checked
I check the "female" radio button
the "female" radio button should be checked
the "male" radio button should not be checked

name: As a user I can interact with radio buttons

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on stored values

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I retrieve the "first value" text and store it as "first value" in global variables
the "second value" should equal the "first value" stored in global variables
the "fourth value" should not equal the "first value" stored in global variables
the "fourth value" should contain the "first value" stored in global variables
the "fifth value" should contain the "first value" stored in global variables
the "third value" should not contain the "first value" stored in global variables

name: As a user I can interact with stored values

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert on switches

I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
the "switch one" switch should be checked
I uncheck the "switch one" switch
the "switch one" switch should not be checked
I check the "switch one" switch
the "switch one" switch should be checked
the "switch two" should not be enabled

name: As a user I can interact with switches

elements.name: As a user I can interact and assert with new tabs

steps.name: I am on the "home" page
I click the "playground" button
I am directed to the "playground" page
I click the "new tab" button
the "2nd" tab should contain the title "Contacts"
the "1st" tab should contain the title "Playground"
I fill in the "search" input on the "2nd" tab with "Sloane Juarez"
the "contact" on the "2nd" tab should be displayed
the "full name label" on the "2nd" tab should contain the text "Name:"
the "name" on the "2nd" tab should equal the text "Sloane Juarez"
the "gender label" on the "2nd" tab should contain the text "Gender:"
the "gender" on the "2nd" tab should equal the text "Female"
the "address label" on the "2nd" tab should contain the text "Address:"
the "address" on the "2nd" tab should equal the text "8162 Tincidunt Rd., Ludhiana"
the "edit" on the "2nd" tab should be displayed
the "delete" on the "2nd" tab should be displayed

name: As a user I can interact with tabs
